title: "Could AI play a role in the justice system?"
excerpt: "The rapid development of artificial intelligence (AI) has led to its deployment in courtrooms overseas. In China, robot judges decide on small claim cases, while in some Malaysian courts, AI has been used to recommend sentences for offenses such as drug possession."
